document_data.caption: A hunting horn.
document_data.name: Hunting Horn
document_data.mainbody: '''Hunting horns''' were [[musical instruments]] in the Realms popular among [[bard]]s.
document_data.Description: These small curved horns produced a sound that could be heard several miles away. They were usually made from wood, horn, [[shell]], or [[brass]].
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 20–35 [[gold piece]]s depending on the material used in their construction.
document_data.Notable Users: * Hunting horns were favored by bards and hunters.
